name: Space man adventure dash
detailed_description:
Space man adventure dash is to be a brave cosmonaut and overcome as far as possible. Jump from platform to platform, dodge enemies and count down meters.

The player needs will concentration and skill in order to score as many points as possible.

At first glance, the game may seem very easy and simple, but after 5-10 rounds of the game, you will realize how much your reaction is weak.

The game trains the reaction and stress-resistance. Click mouse for fly.

Pixel 2D graphics, 8 bit sound, space, jetpack and hardcore. Open the achievements making your way farther and farther.
Several types of binomial levels. several kinds of enemies. Retro Hardcore.

short_description: Space man adventure dash is to be a brave cosmonaut and overcome as far as possible. Jump from platform to platform, dodge enemies and count down meters. The player needs will concentration and skill in order to score as many points as possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
